sentences.sContent: A second excavation, in 1985, lasted a year and was cut short for technical reasons.
sentences.sContent_eng: A second excavation, in 1985, lasted a year and was cut short for technical reasons.
sentences.sCn: 第二次挖掘是在1985年，因为技术原因持续了一年就突然停止了。

sentences.sContent: If he thinks I’m particular about excavation records, you should see him taking pictures!
sentences.sContent_eng: If he thinks I’m particular about excavation records, you should see him taking pictures!
sentences.sCn: 如果他觉得我对挖掘纪录很挑剔，你应该看看他是怎么拍照的。

sentences.sContent: Blue flags define the excavation perimeter, while yellow ones mark the location of fossils or stone tools.
sentences.sContent_eng: Blue flags define the excavation perimeter, while yellow ones mark the location of fossils or stone tools.
sentences.sCn: 蓝旗用来显示发掘地的周长，而黄旗用来标明发掘出化石或石制工具的地点。

remMethod.val: ex(出) + cav(洞) + ation → 从洞里挖出来 → 挖掘
